title: lotus-bloom
description: A story about a woman discoving a purpose in life through photography

chapters.title: Sương Mai and the Smell of Morning Phở
chapters.description: Mai's routine, corporate life, and a quiet artistic awakening.

sentences.Sáng sớm, mùi phở bò thoang thoảng từ qu: Early in the morning, the faint aroma of beef pho from the familiar shop at the alley's entrance woke Mai.
sentences.Mẹ đã ngồi vào bàn, đôi mắt còn vương vẻ: Her mother was already seated at the table, her eyes still a bit hazy, but the smile she gave when Mai placed the steaming bowl of pho in front of her was still warm.
sentences.\"Mẹ ăn ngon nhé,\" Mai khẽ nói, lòng ch: "Enjoy your meal, Mom," Mai said softly, her heart suddenly sinking.
sentences.Những khoảnh khắc bình yên bên mẹ thế nà: These peaceful moments with her mother, however brief, were a soothing balm for Mai's soul.
sentences.Đưa mẹ về nhà, Mai lại hòa mình vào dòng: After taking her mother home, Mai plunged back into the bustling traffic of Saigon.
sentences.Văn phòng máy lạnh Quận 1, những con số: The air-conditioned office in District 1, and the dry figures of beverage marketing, sometimes stifled her.
sentences.Hôm nay, nhiệm vụ thiết kế hình ảnh sản: Today, the task of designing images for the new product seemed monotonous.
sentences.Nhưng khi nhìn vào chai nước với những g: But as she looked at the water bottle with condensation, Mai suddenly remembered the morning sunlight filtering through the leaves, and the "soul" she used to love capturing with her lens.
It was time to return to photography.
